item.title: KuCoin 在加密货币案中认罪，同意支付 3 亿美元
item.description: 加密货币交易所 KuCoin 承认经营未经许可的汇款业务，并同意接受近 3 亿美元的罚款和没收，继一年多前在纽约解决了类似的民事索赔后，又解决了一起刑事案件。【原文：The cryptocurrency exchange KuCoin pleaded guilty to operating an unlicensed money transmitting business and agreed to almost $300 million in fines and forfeitures, resolving a criminal case after settling similar civil claims in New York more than a year ago.】

item.description: 本周一，美国投资者在科技股和相关 ETF 上遭受了令人瞠目的损失，但大西洋彼岸的另一批投机交易者的境况更糟，这让他们稍感安慰。【原文：As levered-up US investors sustained eye-popping losses in tech stocks and related ETFs on Monday, they could take some comfort from the fact that another batch of speculative traders across the Atlantic had it even worse.】
